name: Signpost 1
Dialogue:
TRAINER TIPS
Use SELECT to switch items in the ITEM window!

name: Signpost 2
Dialogue:
TRAINER TIPS
Look to the left of that post!

name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: I found CABROS in a cave once.

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: CARBOS boosted the SPEED of my POKEMON.

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: My bird POKEMON want to scrap!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: My POKEMON look happy even though they lost.

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: I'm told I'm good for a kid!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: I want to become a good trainer. I'll train hard.

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: Sure, I'll play with you!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: I wonder which is stronger, male or female POKEMON?

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Do you want to POKEMON with me?

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: I didn't know anything about POKEMON. I just like cool ones!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: Wow! Your BADGEs are too cool!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: You got those BADGEs from GYM LEADERS. I know!

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: My cute POKEMON wish to make your acquaintance.

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: You have to make POKEMON fight to toughen them up!

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: I always go with bird POKEMON!

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: I wish I could fly like PIDGEY and PIDGEOTTO...

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: The wind's blowing my way!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: I'm beat. I guess I'll FLY home.

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: What're you lookin' at?

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue: Get lost!
